home.title: Guided visit
home.caption1: Scroll through the images and videos at the different points of interaction.
home.caption2: Click on the images to enlarge them. You can also get more detail by using the zoom.
home.caption3: For your own comfort and that of the other visitors, please connect your earphones to have the benefit of the audio content.
home.caption4: By keeping your application open throughout your visit, you will receive information about the points for interaction.
home.caption5: Activate the Bluetooth of your smartphone to receive the notifications concerning the interaction points.

d1.title: Points activated
d1.content: All the points have been activated and are now available in the menu.

d2.title: Application re-set
d2.content: It is advisable to close and then re-open the application in order to take full advantage of all its functionalities.
